CustomField.defaultValue: "CAP: Engage when a customer relationship is in severe jeopardy and other escalation processes have failed. CAT: Engage when an account team requires support to drive internal processes and/or issues across functions / industries / organizations / geographies to enhance Customer Satisfaction and strategic account growth. Watch List: a Program Manager is assigned to monitor BAU, in the event progress is not made, the request can be resubmitted and dispositioned accordingly."
CustomField.label: Summary
